title: The Pumpkin King - An Erotic Paranormal Short Story
description: An erotic, raunchy delight for your reading pleasure, this festive fall season!Greta is a botanist who finds herself camping in the woods alone . What she was not prepared for, was stumbling upon a magical kingdom, where all creatures of the night dwell. That kingdom is Hollowsville! That very evening, a magical and spooky ceremony must take place. One where the King of Hollowsville must have a Queen chosen for him.The Pumpkin King, a pumpkin-headed creature with the body of a male, is not exactly happy to find a human in his Kingdom. But after seeing Greta, he finds himself quickly changing his mind.Out of all the monsters she sees, the Pumpkin King is the truly most intimidating. And she can't help but find herself attracted to his seductive voice and supernatural body!But because she is a human in a forbidden land, will he give her a trickâ€¦. Or treat???Be spooked by this funny and sexy tale, of a human and monster, who find themselves in an unlikely situation, with a powerfully intense lust growing between them![ paranormal, erotic, erotica, romance, monster, sex, indie, self-published, creature, november, autumn, fall, mf]
author: Cara Demone
